price: 147. En Wij stuurden naar hem honderdduizend (mensen) of zelfs meer.
arabic: وَأَرۡسَلۡنَٰهُ إِلَىٰ مِاْئَةِ أَلۡفٍ أَوۡ يَزِيدُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wa-arsalnāhu ilā mi-ati alfin aw yazīdūna
